Name: Tratto Limoncello Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bourbon laced lemon sherbet – a bittersweet aperitif.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Cynthia Tran, Beverage Director at Tratto Restaurant in San Francisco, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Tratto Limoncello Cocktail contains 151 calories
